item.title: Deploy Vault, Consul, KES, MinIO on kubernetes
item.description:
<!-- build time:Tue Mar 23 2021 20:43:37 GMT+0800 (中国标准时间) --><h2 id="总览"><a class="anchor" href="#总览">#</a> 总览</h2><p>Vault, Consul, KES, MinIO 都部署在 K8s.</p><h2 id="referenc-link"><a class="anchor" href="#referenc-link">#</a> referenc link</h2><p>vault:<br><span class="exturl" data-url="aHR0cDovL2RvY3MubWluaW8ub3JnLmNuL2RvY3MvbWFzdGVyL21pbmlvLWttcy1xdWlja3N0YXJ0LWd1aWRl">http://docs.minio.org.cn/docs/master/minio-kms-quickstart-guide</span><br><span class="exturl" data-url="aHR0cHM6Ly9naXRodWIuY29tL2hhc2hpY29ycC92YXVsdC1oZWxtL2Jsb2IvbWFzdGVyL3ZhbHVlcy55YW1s">https://github.com/hashicorp/vault-helm/blob/master/values.yaml</span><br><span class="exturl" data-url="aHR0cHM6Ly9sZWFybi5oYXNoaWNvcnAuY29tL3R1dG9yaWFscy92YXVsdC9rdWJlcm5ldGVzLXJhZnQtZGVwbG95bWVudC1ndWlkZT9pbj12YXVsdC9rdWJlcm5ldGVz">https://learn.hashicorp.com/tutorials/vault/kubernetes-raft-deployment-guide?in=vault/kubernetes</span><br><span class="exturl" data-url="aHR0cHM6Ly9sZWFybi5oYXNoaWNvcnAuY29tL3R1dG9yaWFscy92YXVsdC90cm91Ymxlc2hvb3RpbmctdmF1bHQ/aW49dmF1bHQvb3BlcmF0aW9ucyNzZXJ2ZXItZ2F2ZS1odHRwLXJlc3BvbnNlLXRvLWh0dHBzLWNsaWVudA==">https://learn.hashicorp.com/tutorials/vault/troubleshooting-vault?in=vault/operations#server-gave-http-response-to-https-client</span></p><p>KES:<br><span class="exturl" data-url="aHR0cHM6Ly9naXRodWIuY29tL21pbmlvL2tlcw==">https://github.com/minio/kes</span><br><span class="exturl" data-url="aHR0cHM6Ly9naXRodWIuY29tL21pbmlvL2tlcy9ibG9iL21hc3Rlci9Eb2NrZXJmaWxlLnJlbGVhc2U=">https://github.com/minio/kes/blob/master/Dockerfile.release</span></p><h2 id="概念"><a class="anchor" href="#概念">#</a> 概念</h2><p>MinIO 使用密钥管理系统（KMS）支持 SSE-S3。如果客户端请求 SSE-S3，或 启用了自动加密，则 MinIO 服务器会使用唯一的对象密钥对每个对象进行加密，该对象密钥受 KMS 管理的主密钥保护。</p><p>KMS 将 MinIO 作为面向应用程序的存储系统与安全密钥存储区分开，并且 可以由专门的安全团队进行管理。MinIO 通过我们的 KES project 支持常用的 KMS 实现，例如 Hashicorp Vault。 通过 KES，可以利用存储基础架构（MinIO 群集）水平扩展 KMS。 通常，MinIO-KMS 基础结构如下所示：</p><pre><code> ┌─────────┐ ┌────────────┐ ┌─────────┐ │ MinIO ├─────────┤ KES Server ├─────────┤ KMS │ └─────────┘ └────────────┘ └─────────┘ </code></pre><p>当您将存储基础架构扩展到多个 MinIO 群集时，您的架构应如下所示：</p><pre><code> ┌────────────┐ │ ┌──────────┴─┬─────╮ ┌────────────┐ └─┤ ┌──────────┴─┬───┴──────────┤ ┌──────────┴─┬─────────────────╮ └─┤ ┌──────────┴─┬─────┬──────┴─┤ KES Server ├─────────────────┤ └─┤ MinIO ├─────╯ └────────────┘ ┌────┴────┐ └────────────┘ │ KMS │ └─────────┘ </code></pre><p><strong><code>请注意</code> </strong>，所有 MinIO 群集均仅具有 <strong><code>其自己的</code> </strong>KES 实例的连接，而不能直接访问 Vault（作为一种可能的 KMS 实现）。 每个 KES 实例将处理 “其” MinIO 群集发出的所有加密 / 解密请求，从而使中央 KMS 实现不必处理 大量流量。相反，每个 KES 实例都将使用中央 KMS 实现作为安全密钥存储，并从中获取所需的主密钥。</p><p>该指南显示了如何使用 Hashicorp Vault 作为 KMS 实施来设置 MinIO-KMS 部署。 因此，它显示了如何设置和配置：</p><ul><li>Vault 服务器作为中央密钥库。</li><li>一个 KES 服务器实例，作为 MinIO 和保险柜之间的中间件。</li><li>MinIO 实例本身。</li></ul><div class="note info"><p><strong><code>请注意,</code> </strong>为简便起见，本指南使用自签名证书。在生产部署中，应使用 由<span class="blue"> “公共”</span>（例如，让我们加密）或组织内部的 CA 颁发的 X.509 证书。</p></div><p>本指南说明如何在同一台计算机上设置三台不同的服务器：</p><ul><li>Vault 服务器为 <span class="exturl" data-url="aHR0cHM6Ly8xMjcuMC4wLjE6ODIwMA==">https://127.0.0.1:8200</span></li><li>KES 服务器为 <span class="exturl" data-url="aHR0cHM6Ly8xMjcuMC4wLjE6NzM3Mw==">https://127.0.0.1:7373</span></li><li>MinIO 在 K8s 上部署后 9000 映射到主机端口位 30007, 则服务器为 <span class="exturl" data-url="aHR0cHM6Ly8xMjcuMC4wLjE6MzAwMDc=">https://127.0.0.1:30007</span></li></ul><h2 id="download"><a class="anchor" href="#download">#</a> Download</h2><p>安装 MinIO，KES 和 Vault。对于 MinIO，请参阅 MinIO 快速入门指南。然后安装 KES 并下载 适用于您的操作系统和平台的最新 Vault 二进制文件.</p><h3 id="vault"><a class="anchor" href="#vault">#</a> Vault:</h3><figure class="highlight bash"><figcaption data-lang="bash"><span>h 命令行提示符</span></figcaption><table><tr class="marked"><td data-num="1"></td><td data-command="$"></td><td><pre><span class="token function">wget</span> https://releases.hashicorp.com/vault/1.7.0-rc1/vault_1.7.0-rc1_linux_amd64.zip</pre></td></tr><tr class="marked"><td data-num="2"></td><td data-command="$"></td><td><pre><span class="token function">unzip</span> vault_1.7.0-rc1_linux_amd64.zip</pre></td></tr><tr class="marked"><td data-num="3"></td><td data-command="$"></td><td><pre><span class="token function">mv</span> vault /usr/local/bin/ <span class="token comment"># 如果 cp 过去的话，下面启动 vault server 时候自动创建的 vault 文件夹会与此已存在的 vault 二进制文件冲突，因此直接 move 过去.</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="4"></td><td data-command=""></td><td><pre></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="5"></td><td data-command="#"></td><td><pre><span class="token comment"># vault 可以在 Linux 系统上使用 mlock syscall 来防止 OS 将内存中的数据写入磁盘（交换）</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="6"></td><td data-command="$"></td><td><pre><span class="token function">sudo</span> setcap <span class="token assign-left variable">cap_ipc_lock</span><span class="token operator">=</span>+ep <span class="token variable"><span class="token variable">$(</span>readlink -f <span class="token punctuation">$(</span>which vault<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token variable">)</span></span></pre></td></tr></table></figure><h3 id="kes"><a class="anchor" href="#kes">#</a> KES:</h3><p><span class="exturl" data-url="aHR0cHM6Ly9naXRodWIuY29tL21pbmlvL2tlcyNiaW5hcnktcmVsZWFzZXM=">https://github.com/minio/kes#binary-releases</span></p><pre><code>wget https://github.com/minio/kes/releases/latest/download/kes-linux-amd64 mv kes-linux-amd64 kes chmod +x kes cp kes /usr/local/bin/ kes -h
# KES 可以在Linux系统上使用 mlock syscall 来防止 OS 将内存中的数据写入磁盘（交换） sudo setcap cap_ipc_lock=+ep $(readlink -f $(which kes)) </code></pre><h3 id="minio"><a class="anchor" href="#minio">#</a> MinIO：</h3><pre><code>wget https://dl.min.io/server/minio/release/linux-amd64/minio chmod +x minio cp minio /usr/local/bin/ </code></pre><h3 id="mc"><a class="anchor" href="#mc">#</a> mc:</h3><pre><code>wget https://dl.min.io/client/mc/release/linux-amd64/mc chmod +x mc ./mc --help </code></pre><h2 id="机器配置"><a class="anchor" href="#机器配置">#</a> 机器配置</h2><table><thead><tr><th style="text-align:left">IP</th><th style="text-align:left">机器名</th><th style="text-align:left">用途</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td style="text-align:left">10.239.140.73</td><td style="text-align:left">master</td><td style="text-align:left">K8S 集群节点，master (去除污点), 部署 KMS, KES 到本机，MinIO 部署到 K8S 集群</td></tr><tr><td style="text-align:left">10.239.131.157</td><td style="text-align:left">laboratory</td><td style="text-align:left">K8S 集群节点，master (去除污点)</td></tr></tbody></table><p>openssl 版本：</p><pre><code>$ openssl version -a OpenSSL 1.1.1j 16 Feb 2021 built on: Tue Mar 16 02:55:39 2021 UTC platform: linux-x86_64 options: bn(64,64) rc4(16x,int) des(int) idea(int) blowfish(ptr) compiler: gcc -fPIC -pthread -m64 -Wa,--noexecstack -Wall -O3 -DOPENSSL_USE_NODELETE -DL_ENDIAN -DOPENSSL_PIC -DOPENSSL_CPUID_OBJ -DOPENSSL_IA32_SSE2 -DOPENSSL_BN_ASM_MONT -DOPENSSL_BN_ASM_MONT5 -DOPENSSL_BN_ASM_GF2m -DSHA1_ASM -DSHA256_ASM -DSHA512_ASM -DKECCAK1600_ASM -DRC4_ASM -DMD5_ASM -DAESNI_ASM -DVPAES_ASM -DGHASH_ASM -DECP_NISTZ256_ASM -DX25519_ASM -DPOLY1305_ASM -DZLIB -DNDEBUG OPENSSLDIR: &quot;/usr/local/openssl/ssl&quot; ENGINESDIR: &quot;/usr/local/openssl/lib/engines-1.1&quot; Seeding source: os-specific </code></pre><h2 id="生成证书"><a class="anchor" href="#生成证书">#</a> 生成证书</h2><h3 id="根证书"><a class="anchor" href="#根证书">#</a> 根证书</h3><figure class="highlight shell"><figcaption data-lang="Bash"><span>l</span></figcaption><table><tr><td data-num="1"></td><td><pre>openssl genrsa -out <span class="token string">"root-ca.key"</span> <span class="token number">4096</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="2"></td><td><pre><span class="token comment"># 注意，csr 里 subj 的 CN 会覆盖下面生成证书配置文件的 CN.</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="3"></td><td><pre>openssl req -new -key <span class="token string">"root-ca.key"</span> -out <span class="token string">"root-ca.csr"</span> -sha512 <span class="token punctuation">\</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="4"></td><td><pre> -subj <span class="token string">'/C=US/ST=CA/L=China/O=Hce/CN=Vault CA'</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="5"></td><td><pre></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="6"></td><td><pre><span class="token function">cat</span> <span class="token operator">></span> <span class="token string">"root-ca.conf"</span> <span class="token operator">&lt;&lt;</span><span class="token string">EOL</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="7"></td><td><pre>[root_ca]</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="8"></td><td><pre>basicConstraints = critical,CA:TRUE,pathlen:1</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="9"></td><td><pre>keyUsage = critical, nonRepudiation, cRLSign, keyCertSign</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="10"></td><td><pre>subjectKeyIdentifier=hash</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="11"></td><td><pre>EOL</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="12"></td><td><pre></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="13"></td><td><pre>openssl x509 -req -days <span class="token number">3650</span> -in <span class="token string">"root-ca.csr"</span> -signkey <span class="token string">"root-ca.key"</span> -sha512 <span class="token punctuation">\</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="14"></td><td><pre> -out <span class="token string">"root-ca.crt"</span> -extfile <span class="token string">"root-ca.conf"</span> -extensions root_ca</pre></td></tr></table></figure><p><strong>{-extensions root_ca}(.blue)</strong> 指向 minio-crt.conf 配置文件中的 <strong>{[root_ca]}(.blue)</strong>.</p><p>root-ca.conf, 也完全可以参照下面 vault 生成证书的简单配置文件编写，此处只是为了记录初学时候部署的文件内容.</p><figure class="highlight yaml"><figcaption data-lang="YAML"><span>l</span></figcaption><table><tr><td data-num="1"></td><td><pre><span class="token punctuation">[</span>req<span class="token punctuation">]</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="2"></td><td><pre>distinguished_name = req_distinguished_name</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="3"></td><td><pre>x509_extensions = v3_req</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="4"></td><td><pre>prompt = no</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="5"></td><td><pre></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="6"></td><td><pre><span class="token punctuation">[</span>req_distinguished_name<span class="token punctuation">]</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="7"></td><td><pre>C = US</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="8"></td><td><pre>ST = state</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="9"></td><td><pre>L = location</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="10"></td><td><pre>O = organization</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="11"></td><td><pre>CN = localhost <span class="token comment">#会被生成 csr 的 CN 值替换</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="12"></td><td><pre></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="13"></td><td><pre><span class="token punctuation">[</span>v3_req<span class="token punctuation">]</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="14"></td><td><pre>subjectAltName = @alt_names</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="15"></td><td><pre></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="16"></td><td><pre><span class="token punctuation">[</span>alt_names<span class="token punctuation">]</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="17"></td><td><pre>IP.1 = 127.0.0.1</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="18"></td><td><pre>IP.2 = 10.239.140.73</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="19"></td><td><pre>DNS.1 = <span class="token important">*.minio-hl-svc.minio.svc.cluster.local</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="20"></td><td><pre>DNS.2 = master</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="21"></td><td><pre>DNS.3 = localhost</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="22"></td><td><pre></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="23"></td><td><pre><span class="token punctuation">[</span>root_ca<span class="token punctuation">]</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="24"></td><td><pre>basicConstraints = critical<span class="token punctuation">,</span>CA<span class="token punctuation">:</span><span class="token boolean important">TRUE</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span>pathlen<span class="token punctuation">:</span><span class="token number">1</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="25"></td><td><pre>keyUsage = critical<span class="token punctuation">,</span> nonRepudiation<span class="token punctuation">,</span> cRLSign<span class="token punctuation">,</span> keyCertSign</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="26"></td><td><pre>subjectKeyIdentifier=hash</pre></td></tr></table></figure><h3 id="vault证书"><a class="anchor" href="#vault证书">#</a> vault 证书</h3><figure class="highlight shell"><figcaption data-lang="Bash"><span>l</span></figcaption><table><tr><td data-num="1"></td><td><pre><span class="token function">mkdir</span> pki</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="2"></td><td><pre><span class="token builtin class-name">cd</span> pki</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="3"></td><td><pre>openssl ecparam -genkey -name prime256v1 <span class="token operator">|</span> openssl ec -out vault-server.key</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="4"></td><td><pre>openssl req -new -key <span class="token string">"vault-server.key"</span> -out <span class="token string">"vault-server.csr"</span> -sha384 <span class="token punctuation">\</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="5"></td><td><pre> -subj <span class="token string">'/C=US/ST=CA/L=China/O=Hce/CN=vault.dev.svc.cluster.local'</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="6"></td><td><pre>openssl x509 -req -days <span class="token number">30</span> -in <span class="token string">"vault-server.csr"</span> -CA <span class="token string">"root-ca.crt"</span> -CAkey <span class="token string">"root-ca.key"</span> -CAcreateserial -out <span class="token string">"vault-server.crt"</span> -extfile <span class="token string">"vault-crt.conf"</span> -extensions vault_server</pre></td></tr></table></figure><p>vault-crt.conf 文件内容</p><figure class="highlight yaml"><figcaption data-lang="YAML"><span>l</span></figcaption><table><tr><td data-num="1"></td><td><pre><span class="token punctuation">[</span>vault_server<span class="token punctuation">]</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="2"></td><td><pre>authorityKeyIdentifier=keyid<span class="token punctuation">,</span>issuer</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="3"></td><td><pre>basicConstraints = critical<span class="token punctuation">,</span>CA<span class="token punctuation">:</span><span class="token boolean important">FALSE</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="4"></td><td><pre>extendedKeyUsage=serverAuth<span class="token punctuation">,</span>clientAuth</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="5"></td><td><pre>keyUsage = critical<span class="token punctuation">,</span> digitalSignature<span class="token punctuation">,</span> keyEncipherment</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="6"></td><td><pre>subjectAltName = DNS<span class="token punctuation">:</span>localhost<span class="token punctuation">,</span> DNS<span class="token punctuation">:</span>vault.dev.svc.cluster.local DNS<span class="token punctuation">:</span>master<span class="token punctuation">,</span> IP<span class="token punctuation">:</span>127.0.0.1<span class="token punctuation">,</span> IP<span class="token punctuation">:</span>10.239.140.73</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="7"></td><td><pre>subjectKeyIdentifier=hash</pre></td></tr></table></figure><h3 id="kesminio证书"><a class="anchor" href="#kesminio证书">#</a> KES/minio 证书</h3><p>KES 和 minio 共用一样的密钥和证书，原因是目前没办法把 KES 证书挂载到 minio 容器，就先这样，后续会更新.</p><figure class="highlight shell"><figcaption data-lang="Bash"><span>l</span></figcaption><table><tr><td data-num="1"></td><td><pre>openssl ecparam -genkey -name prime256v1 <span class="token operator">|</span> openssl ec -out private.key</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="2"></td><td><pre></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="3"></td><td><pre><span class="token comment"># 注意，csr 里 subj 的 CN 会覆盖下面生成证书配置文件的 CN.</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="4"></td><td><pre>openssl req -new -key <span class="token string">"private.key"</span> -out <span class="token string">"public.csr"</span> -sha384 <span class="token punctuation">\</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="5"></td><td><pre> -subj <span class="token string">'/C=US/ST=CA/L=China/O=Hce/CN=*.minio-hl-svc.minio.svc.cluster.local'</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="6"></td><td><pre></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="7"></td><td><pre>openssl x509 -req -days <span class="token number">30</span> -in <span class="token string">"public.csr"</span> -CA <span class="token string">"root-ca.crt"</span> -CAkey <span class="token string">"root-ca.key"</span> -CAcreateserial -out <span class="token string">"public.crt"</span> -extfile <span class="token string">"minio-crt.conf"</span> -extensions minio_server</pre></td></tr></table></figure><p><strong>{-extensions minio_server}(.blue)</strong> 指向 minio-crt.conf 配置文件中的 <strong>{[minio_server]}(.blue)</strong>.</p><p>minio-crt.conf 文件内容</p><figure class="highlight yaml"><figcaption data-lang="YAML"><span>l</span></figcaption><table><tr><td data-num="1"></td><td><pre><span class="token punctuation">[</span>minio_server<span class="token punctuation">]</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="2"></td><td><pre>authorityKeyIdentifier=keyid<span class="token punctuation">,</span>issuer</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="3"></td><td><pre>basicConstraints = critical<span class="token punctuation">,</span>CA<span class="token punctuation">:</span><span class="token boolean important">FALSE</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="4"></td><td><pre>extendedKeyUsage=serverAuth<span class="token punctuation">,</span>clientAuth</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="5"></td><td><pre>keyUsage = critical<span class="token punctuation">,</span> digitalSignature<span class="token punctuation">,</span> keyEncipherment</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="6"></td><td><pre>subjectAltName = DNS<span class="token punctuation">:</span>localhost<span class="token punctuation">,</span> DNS<span class="token punctuation">:</span><span class="token important">*.minio-hl-svc.minio.svc.cluster.local</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span> DNS<span class="token punctuation">:</span>kes<span class="token punctuation">-</span>svc.minio.svc.cluster.local<span class="token punctuation">,</span> DNS<span class="token punctuation">:</span>master<span class="token punctuation">,</span> DNS<span class="token punctuation">:</span>laboratory<span class="token punctuation">,</span>IP<span class="token punctuation">:</span>127.0.0.1<span class="token punctuation">,</span> IP<span class="token punctuation">:</span>10.239.140.73<span class="token punctuation">,</span>IP<span class="token punctuation">:</span>10.239.131.157</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="7"></td><td><pre>subjectKeyIdentifier=hash</pre></td></tr></table></figure><p><strong>{subjectAltName}(.blue)</strong> 表明此证书属于列出的服务 A 所属的域名和 IP, 服务 B 访问此服务 A 时，会将服务 A 的所属的域名和 IP 与服务 A 的有效证书中包含的域名和 IP 比较，一致或包含则验证通过.</p><p>拷贝一份密钥和证书给 KES 用.</p><figure class="highlight shell"><figcaption data-lang="Bash"><span>l</span></figcaption><table><tr><td data-num="1"></td><td><pre><span kes-server.key</pre></td></tr></table></figure><p>再拷贝一份 minio 的密钥和证书给 KES 配置文件充当 KES 链接 Minio 的证书，后面生成 KES image 的 Dockerfile 里会体现.</p><figure class="highlight shell"><figcaption data-lang="Bash"><span>l</span></figcaption><table><tr><td data-num="1"></td><td><pre><span class="token function">cp</span> public.crt minio-public.crt</pre></td></tr><tr><td tls: key: /pki/kes-server.key cert: /pki/kes-server.crt
policy: my-app: paths: - /v1/key/create/minio-* - /v1/key/generate/minio-* - /v1/key/decrypt/minio-* identities: - eb4578522850ad2872f2fe4fbb8764c5a16d6581f4a47c8fbf8a42607a6f4f3f
cache: expiry: any: 5m0s unused: 20s
keys: vault: endpoint: https://vault.dev.svc.cluster.local:8200 prefix: minio approle: id: &quot;28ec4770-59d8-c6d2-5b35-3eb828cfb23f&quot; # Your AppRole ID secret: &quot;b47a3bf6-f280-3221-27cc-c599d8211e28&quot; # Your AppRole Secret ID retry: 15s status: ping: 10s tls: ca: &quot;/pki/vault/vault-server.crt&quot; # Since we use self-signed certificates operator">&lt;</span>client-certificate<span class="token operator">></span> // e.g. <span class="token environment constant">$HOME</span>/root.cert</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="25"></td><td><pre> kes --help</pre></td></tr></table></figure><h3 id="dockerfile"><a class="anchor" href="#dockerfile">#</a> Dockerfile</h3><pre><code>FROM registry.access.redhat.com/ubi8/ubi-minimal:8.3
LABEL name=&quot;MinIO&quot; \ vendor=&quot;MinIO Inc &lt;dev@min.io&gt;&quot; \ maintainer=&quot;MinIO Inc &lt;dev@min.io&gt;&quot; \ version=&quot;v0.13.4&quot; \ release=&quot;v0.13.4&quot; \ summary=&quot;KES is a stateless and distributed key-management system for high-performance applications.&quot; \ description=&quot;KES as the bridge between modern applications - running as containers on Kubernetes - and centralized KMS solutions. Therefore, KES has been designed to be simple, scalable and secure by default. It has just a few knobs to tweak instead of a complex configuration and does not require a deep understanding of secure key-management or cryptography.&quot;
ARG HTTP_PROXY ARG HTTPS_PROXY
RUN \ microdnf update --nodocs &amp;&amp; \ microdnf install ca-certificates --nodocs &amp;&amp; \ microdnf clean all &amp;&amp; \ mkdir /licenses &amp;&amp; \ curl -s -q https://raw.githubusercontent.com/minio/kes/master/CREDITS -o /licenses/CREDITS &amp;&amp; \ curl -s -q https://raw.githubusercontent.com/minio/kes/master/LICENSE -o /licenses/LICENSE
COPY kes /kes
COPY ./kes-config.yaml /kes-config.yaml RUN mkdir /pki RUN mkdir /pki/vault COPY ./kes-server.crt /pki/ COPY ./kes-server.key /pki/ COPY ./minio-public.crt /pki/ COPY ./minio-private.key /pki/ COPY ./vault-server.crt /pki/vault/
ENV VAULT_SKIP_VERIFY true ENV KES_CLIENT_CERT /pki/minio-public.crt ENV KES_CLIENT_KEY /pki/minio-private.key
EXPOSE 7373
WORKDIR /
ENTRYPOINT [&quot;/kes&quot;, &quot;server&quot;, &quot;--config=kes-config.yaml&quot;, &quot;--root=disabled&quot;, &quot;--auth=off&quot;]
</code></pre><h3 id="kes-k8syaml"><a class="anchor" href="#kes-k8syaml">#</a> kes-k8s.yaml</h3><figure class="highlight yaml"><figcaption data-lang="YAML"><span>l</span></figcaption><table><tr><td data-num="25"></td><td><pre><span class="token comment"># delete minio sc</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="26"></td><td><pre>kubectl delete -k direct-csi</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="27"></td><td><pre></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="28"></td><td><pre><span class="token comment"># delete secret</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="29"></td><td><pre>kubectl delete secret tls-ssl-minio -n minio</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="30"></td><td><pre></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="31"></td><td><pre><span class="token comment"># delete ns</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="32"></td><td><pre>kubectl delete ns minio</pre></td></tr></table></figure><!-- rebuild by hrmmi -->

item.title: 删除crd,pod,pv,pvc等资源
item.description: <!-- build time:Tue Mar 23 2021 20:14:34 GMT+0800 (中国标准时间) --><h2 id="podpvpvc删除顺序"><a class="anchor" href="#podpvpvc删除顺序">#</a> <strong>pod,pv,pvc 删除顺序</strong></h2><p>一般删除步骤为：</p><ul><li>先删 pod</li><li>再删 pvc</li><li>最后删 pv.<br>如果遇到 pv 始终处于 <strong><code>[Terminating]{.blue}</code> </strong>状态，而且 delete 不掉.<br>解决方法是直接删除 k8s 中相对应的 pvc 和 pv 的记录：</li></ul><h2 id="强制删除pod"><a class="anchor" href="#强制删除pod">#</a> <strong>强制删除 pod</strong></h2><p>加参数 <strong><code>--force --grace-period=0</code> </strong>, grace-period 表示过渡存活期，默认 30s，在删除 POD 之前允许 POD 慢慢终止其上的容器进程，从而优雅退出，0 表示立即终止 POD</p><figure class="highlight shell"><figcaption data-lang="Bash"><span>l</span></figcaption><table><tr><td data-num="1"></td><td><pre>kubectl delete po <span class="token operator">&lt;</span>your-pod-name<span class="token operator">></span> -n <span class="token operator">&lt;</span>name-space<span class="token operator">></span> --force --grace-period<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token number">0</span></pre></td></tr></table></figure><h2 id="强制删除pvc和pv"><a class="anchor" href="#强制删除pvc和pv">#</a> <strong>强制删除 pvc 和 pv</strong></h2><figure class="highlight shell"><figcaption data-lang="Bash"></figcaption><table><tr><td data-num="1"></td><td><pre><span class="token comment"># 1. 删除 pvc</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="2"></td><td><pre>kubectl describe pvc PVC_NAME -n NameSpace<span class="token operator">|</span> <span class="token function">grep</span> Finalizers</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="3"></td><td><pre> Finalizers: <span class="token punctuation">[</span>kubernetes.io/pvc-protection<span class="token punctuation">]</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="4"></td><td><pre>kubectl patch pvc PVC_NAME -n NameSpace -p <span class="token string">'&#123;"metadata":&#123;"finalizers": []&#125;&#125;'</span> --type<span class="token operator">=</span>merge</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="5"></td><td><pre></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="6"></td><td><pre><span class="token comment"># 2. 删除 pv</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="7"></td><td><pre>kubectl patch <span class="token function">pv</span> xxx -p <span class="token string">'&#123;"metadata":&#123;"finalizers":null&#125;&#125;'</span></pre></td></tr></table></figure><h2 id="强制删除crd"><a class="anchor" href="#强制删除crd">#</a> <strong>强制删除 crd</strong></h2><figure class="highlight shell"><figcaption data-lang="Bash"></figcaption><table><tr><td data-num="1"></td><td><pre><span class="token comment"># remove the CRD finalizer blocking on custom resource cleanup</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="2"></td><td><pre>kubectl patch crd/greenplumclusters.greenplum.pivotal.io -p <span class="token string">'&#123;"metadata":&#123;"finalizers":[]&#125;&#125;'</span> --type<span class="token operator">=</span>merge</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="3"></td><td><pre> customresourcedefinition.apiextensions.k8s.io/kibanas.kibana.k8s.elastic.co patched</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="4"></td><td><pre></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="5"></td><td><pre>// 再次删除资源 </pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="6"></td><td><pre>$ kubectl delete crd greenplumclusters.greenplum.pivotal.io</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="7"></td><td><pre>OK搞定了~</pre></td></tr></table></figure><h2 id="删除某个namespace"><a class="anchor" href="#删除某个namespace">#</a> <strong>删除某个 namespace</strong></h2><p>在 k8s 中会无法删除某个 namespace，它会一直卡在 terminating 状态.<br>这个指令找到阻碍这个 namespace 删除的资源，然后手动删除这些资源.</p><figure class="highlight shell"><figcaption data-lang="Bash"></figcaption><table><tr><td data-num="1"></td><td><pre>kubectl api-resources --verbs<span class="token operator">=</span>list --namespaced -o name <span class="token operator">|</span> <span class="token function">xargs</span> -n <span class="token number">1</span> kubectl get --show-kind --ignore-not-found -n <span class="token operator">&lt;</span>namespace<span class="token operator">></span></pre></td></tr></table></figure><!-- rebuild by hrmmi -->

item.title: mount挂载磁盘
item.description: <!-- build time:Tue Mar 23 2021 20:14:34 GMT+0800 (中国标准时间) --><h2 id="mount挂载磁盘"><a class="anchor" href="#mount挂载磁盘">#</a> mount 挂载磁盘</h2><figure class="highlight shell"><figcaption data-lang="Bash"><span>l</span></figcaption><table><tr><td data-num="1"></td><td><pre><span class="token function">mount</span> /dev/sda8 /mnt/minio_data/</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="2"></td><td><pre> mount: /dev/sda8 is write-protected, mounting read-only</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="3"></td><td><pre> mount: unknown filesystem <span class="token builtin class-name">type</span> <span class="token string">'(null)'</span></pre></td></tr></table></figure><p>原因是磁盘分区之后直接挂载出现这样的错误， 解决方法</p><figure class="highlight shell"><figcaption data-lang="Bash"><span>l</span></figcaption><table><tr><td data-num="1"></td><td><pre>mkfs.ext4 /dev/sda8</pre></td></tr></table></figure><p>不是刚分区的磁盘慎用，防止格式化.</p><h2 id="umount磁盘"><a class="anchor" href="#umount磁盘">#</a> umount 磁盘</h2><figure class="highlight shell"><figcaption data-lang="Bash"><span>l</span></figcaption><table><tr><td data-num="1"></td><td><pre><span class="token function">umount</span> /dev/sda8</pre></td></tr></table></figure><!-- rebuild by hrmmi -->

item.title: KMS vault
item.description: <!-- build time:Tue Mar 23 2021 20:14:34 GMT+0800 (中国标准时间) --><h2 id="install-vault-on-kubernetes"><a class="anchor" href="#install-vault-on-kubernetes">#</a> Install vault on kubernetes</h2><p>在 kubernetes 上安装 vault</p><p>Reference link:</p><ul><li><p><span class="exturl" data-url="aHR0cHM6Ly9sZWFybi5oYXNoaWNvcnAuY29tLw==">https://learn.hashicorp.com/</span></p></li><li><p>(consul 与 vault 本机部署)<span class="exturl" data-url="aHR0cHM6Ly9sZWFybi5oYXNoaWNvcnAuY29tL3R1dG9yaWFscy92YXVsdC9oYS13aXRoLWNvbnN1bD9pbj12YXVsdC9vcGVyYXRpb25z">https://learn.hashicorp.com/tutorials/vault/ha-with-consul?in=vault/operations</span></p></li><li><p><span class="exturl" data-url="aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cudmF1bHRwcm9qZWN0LmlvL2RvY3MvcGxhdGZvcm0vazhz">https://www.vaultproject.io/docs/platform/k8s</span></p></li><li><p><span class="exturl" data-url="aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cudmF1bHRwcm9qZWN0LmlvL2RvY3MvcGxhdGZvcm0vazhzL2hlbG0vcnVu">https://www.vaultproject.io/docs/platform/k8s/helm/run</span></p></li></ul><h2 id="install-consul"><a class="anchor" href="#install-consul">#</a> Install consul</h2><p>Reference Link:</p><ul><li>(部署步骤)<span class="exturl" data-url="aHR0cHM6Ly9naXRodWIuY29tL2hhc2hpY29ycC9jb25zdWwtaGVsbS90cmVlL3YwLjMwLjA=">https://github.com/hashicorp/consul-helm/tree/v0.30.0</span></li><li>(参数设置)<span class="exturl" data-url="aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuY29uc3VsLmlvL2RvY3MvazhzL2hlbG0=">https://www.consul.io/docs/k8s/helm</span></li><li>(详细文档)<span class="exturl" data-url="aHR0cHM6Ly9sZWFybi5oYXNoaWNvcnAuY29tL3R1dG9yaWFscy9jb25zdWwvc2VydmljZS1tZXNoLWRlcGxveT9pbj1jb25zdWwvZ3MtY29uc3VsLXNlcnZpY2UtbWVzaA==">https://learn.hashicorp.com/tutorials/consul/service-mesh-deploy?in=consul/gs-consul-service-mesh</span></li><li>(TLS,ACL- access control)<span class="exturl" data-url="aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuY29uc3VsLmlvL2RvY3MvazhzL2luc3RhbGxhdGlvbi9pbnN0YWxs">https://www.consul.io/docs/k8s/installation/install</span></li></ul><figure class="highlight shell"><figcaption data-lang="Bash"><span>l</span></figcaption><table><tr><td data-num="1"></td><td><pre>kubectl create namespace dev</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="2"></td><td><pre>helm repo <span class="token function">add</span> hashicorp https://helm.releases.hashicorp.com</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="3"></td><td><pre>helm search repo hashicorp/consul</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="4"></td><td><pre></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="5"></td><td><pre><span class="token comment"># Install Consul server cluster and Consul client agent by helm</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="6"></td><td><pre>helm <span class="token function">install</span> consul hashicorp/consul -f consul-values.yaml --namespace dev</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="7"></td><td><pre></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="8"></td><td><pre><span class="token comment"># Verify the Consul cluster</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="9"></td><td><pre>kubectl <span class="token builtin class-name">exec</span> -it consul-server-0 -n dev -- consul members</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="10"></td><td><pre> Node Address Status Type Build Protocol DC Segment</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="11"></td><td><pre> consul-server-0 <span class="token number">10.32</span>.0.14:8301 alive server <span class="token number">1.9</span>.2 <span class="token number">2</span> dc1 <span class="token operator">&lt;</span>all<span class="token operator">></span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="12"></td><td><pre> consul-server-1 <span class="token number">10.36</span>.0.7:8301 alive server <span class="token number">1.9</span>.2 <span class="token number">2</span> dc1 <span class="token operator">&lt;</span>all<span class="token operator">></span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="13"></td><td><pre> laboratory <span class="token number">10.32</span>.0.13:8301 alive client <span class="token number">1.9</span>.2 <span class="token number">2</span> dc1 <span class="token operator">&lt;</span>default<span class="token operator">></span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="14"></td><td><pre> master <span class="token number">10.36</span>.0.6:8301 alive client <span class="token number">1.9</span>.2 <span class="token number">2</span> dc1 <span class="token operator">&lt;</span>default<span class="token operator">></span></pre></td></tr></table></figure><h2 id="install-vault"><a class="anchor" href="#install-vault">#</a> Install vault</h2><p>Reference Link:<br><span class="exturl" data-url="aHR0cHM6Ly9sZWFybi5oYXNoaWNvcnAuY29tL3R1dG9yaWFscy92YXVsdC9rdWJlcm5ldGVzLXJhZnQtZGVwbG95bWVudC1ndWlkZT9pbj12YXVsdC9rdWJlcm5ldGVz">https://learn.hashicorp.com/tutorials/vault/kubernetes-raft-deployment-guide?in=vault/kubernetes</span></p><figure class="highlight shell"><figcaption data-lang="Bash"><span>l</span></figcaption><table><tr><td data-num="1"></td><td><pre><span class="token comment"># Setup Vault servers</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="2"></td><td><pre>helm <span class="token function">install</span> vault hashicorp/vault --namespace dev -f values.yaml</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="3"></td><td><pre>kubectl get pods --selector<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token string">'app.kubernetes.io/name=vault'</span> --namespace<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token string">'dev'</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="4"></td><td><pre></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="5"></td><td><pre><span class="token comment"># Initialize the vault and unseal servers</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="6"></td><td><pre>kubectl <span class="token builtin class-name">exec</span> -it vault-0 -n dev -- vault operator init</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="7"></td><td><pre></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="8"></td><td><pre><span class="token comment"># Unseal each server. After that, you need to unseal vault-1 and vault-2.</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="9"></td><td><pre>kubectl <span class="token builtin class-name">exec</span> -it vault-0 -n dev -- vault operator unseal <span class="token operator">&lt;</span>unseal_key_<span class="token operator"><span class="token file-descriptor important">1</span>></span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="10"></td><td><pre>kubectl <span class="token builtin class-name">exec</span> -it vault-0 -n dev -- vault operator unseal <span class="token operator">&lt;</span>unseal_key_<span class="token operator"><span class="token file-descriptor important">2</span>></span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="11"></td><td><pre>kubectl <span class="token builtin class-name">exec</span> -it vault-0 -n dev -- vault operator unseal <span class="token operator">&lt;</span>unseal_key_<span class="token operator"><span class="token file-descriptor important">3</span>></span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="12"></td><td><pre></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="13"></td><td><pre><span class="token comment"># Check the vault status and ensure that the servers are initialized and unsealed</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="14"></td><td><pre>kubectl <span class="token builtin class-name">exec</span> -it vault-0 -n dev -- vault status</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="15"></td><td><pre> Key Value</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="16"></td><td><pre> --- -----</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="17"></td><td><pre> Seal Type shamir</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="18"></td><td><pre> Initialized <span class="token boolean">true</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="19"></td><td><pre> Sealed <span class="token boolean">false</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="20"></td><td><pre> Total Shares <span class="token number">5</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="21"></td><td><pre> Threshold <span class="token number">3</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="22"></td><td><pre> Version <span class="token number">1.6</span>.2</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="23"></td><td><pre> Storage Type consul</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="24"></td><td><pre> Cluster Name vault-cluster-3df8e36a</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="25"></td><td><pre> Cluster ID 49c1449f-3cbb-470d-d183-6ccce8bfb738</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="26"></td><td><pre> HA Enabled <span class="token boolean">true</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="27"></td><td><pre> HA Cluster https://vault-0.vault-internal:8201</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="28"></td><td><pre> HA Mode active</pre></td></tr></table></figure><!-- rebuild by hrmmi -->

item.title: 重启linux机器
item.description: <!-- build time:Tue Mar 23 2021 20:14:34 GMT+0800 (中国标准时间) --><h2 id="reboot命令"><a class="anchor" href="#reboot命令">#</a> reboot 命令</h2><p>reboot 命令是最简单的方法，也不需要额外的其他参数，通常，你需要在命令前加上 sudo 以获得权限.</p><figure class="highlight shell"><figcaption data-lang="Bash"><span>l</span></figcaption><table><tr><td data-num="1"></td><td><pre><span class="token function">sudo</span> <span class="token function">reboot</span></pre></td></tr></table></figure><h2 id="shutdown命令"><a class="anchor" href="#shutdown命令">#</a> shutdown 命令</h2><ul><li>立即重启</li></ul><figure class="highlight shell"><figcaption data-lang="Bash"><span>l</span></figcaption><table><tr><td data-num="1"></td><td><pre><span class="token function">sudo</span> <span class="token function">shutdown</span> -r</pre></td></tr></table></figure><ul><li>延迟一段时间重启 (分钟为单位)</li></ul><figure class="highlight shell"><figcaption data-lang="Bash"><span>l</span></figcaption><table><tr><td data-num="1"></td><td><pre><span class="token function">sudo</span> <span class="token function">shutdown</span> -r +10</pre></td></tr></table></figure><p>指定重启的具体时间</p><figure class="highlight shell"><figcaption data-lang="Bash"><span>l</span></figcaption><table><tr><td data-num="1"></td><td><pre><span class="token function">sudo</span> <span class="token function">shutdown</span> -r <span class="token number">16</span>:15</pre></td></tr></table></figure><ul><li>取消之前指定的重启命令</li></ul><figure class="highlight shell"><figcaption data-lang="Bash"><span>l</span></figcaption><table><tr><td data-num="1"></td><td><pre><span class="token function">shutdown</span> -c</pre></td></tr></table></figure><h2 id="init命令"><a class="anchor" href="#init命令">#</a> init 命令</h2><p>重启的命令为：</p><figure class="highlight shell"><figcaption data-lang="Bash"><span>l</span></figcaption><table><tr><td data-num="1"></td><td><pre>init <span class="token number">6</span></pre></td></tr></table></figure><p>也可以直接用于关闭系统：</p><figure class="highlight shell"><figcaption data-lang="Bash"><span>l</span></figcaption><table><tr><td data-num="1"></td><td><pre>init <span class="token number">0</span></pre></td></tr></table></figure><!-- rebuild by hrmmi -->

item.title: openssl update
item.description: <!-- build time:Tue Mar 23 2021 20:14:34 GMT+0800 (中国标准时间) --><h2 id="openssl官网下载"><a class="anchor" href="#openssl官网下载">#</a> openssl 官网下载</h2><ul><li>官方网站：<span class="exturl" data-url="aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cub3BlbnNzbC5vcmc=">https://www.openssl.org</span></li><li>下载:<span class="exturl" data-url="aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cub3BlbnNzbC5vcmcvc291cmNlLw==">https://www.openssl.org/source/</span></li><li>GitHub：<span class="exturl" data-url="aHR0cHM6Ly9naXRodWIuY29tL29wZW5zc2wvb3BlbnNzbA==">https://github.com/openssl/openssl</span></li></ul><p>openssl 版本</p><figure class="highlight shell"><figcaption data-lang="Bash"><span>l</span></figcaption><table><tr><td data-num="1"></td><td><pre>openssl version</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="2"></td><td><pre>openssl version -a</pre></td></tr></table></figure><p><a id="more"></a></p><h2 id="centos上更新openssl"><a class="anchor" href="#centos上更新openssl">#</a> Centos 上更新 Openssl</h2><figure class="highlight shell"><figcaption data-lang="Bash"><span>l</span></figcaption><table><tr><td data-num="1"></td><td><pre><span class="token comment"># 查看 centos 版本</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="2"></td><td><pre><span class="token function">cat</span> /etc/redhat-release</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="3"></td><td><pre> CentOS Linux release <span class="token number">7.9</span>.2009 <span class="token punctuation">(</span>Core<span class="token punctuation">)</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="4"></td><td><pre></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="5"></td><td><pre><span class="token comment"># 查看 openssl 版本</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="6"></td><td><pre>openssl version</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="7"></td><td><pre> OpenSSL <span class="token number">1.0</span>.2k-fips <span class="token number">26</span> Jan <span class="token number">2017</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="8"></td><td><pre></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="9"></td><td><pre><span class="token comment"># 删除旧版本包</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="10"></td><td><pre>yum remove openssl -y</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="11"></td><td><pre></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="12"></td><td><pre><span class="token comment"># 安装依赖</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="13"></td><td><pre><span class="token punctuation">(</span>原始操作<span class="token punctuation">)</span>yum <span class="token function">install</span> gcc gcc-c++ autoconf automake zlib zlib-devel pcre-devel -y</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="14"></td><td><pre><span class="token comment"># 实际安装依赖过程中因为本机已经安装更新过 gcc, 因此用了如下命令安装依赖</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="15"></td><td><pre>yum <span class="token function">install</span> autoconf automake zlib zlib-devel pcre-devel -y</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="16"></td><td><pre></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="17"></td><td><pre><span class="token comment"># 下载包</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="18"></td><td><pre><span class="token function">wget</span> https://www.openssl.org/source/openssl-1.1.1j.tar.gz</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="19"></td><td><pre><span class="token function">tar</span> -zxf openssl-1.1.1j.tar.gz</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="20"></td><td><pre></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="21"></td><td><pre><span class="token comment"># 编译</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="22"></td><td><pre><span class="token builtin class-name">cd</span> openssl-1.1.1j/</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="23"></td><td><pre>./config --prefix<span class="token operator">=</span>/usr/local/openssl shared zlib</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="24"></td><td><pre><span class="token function">make</span> -j</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="25"></td><td><pre><span class="token function">make</span> <span class="token function">install</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="26"></td><td><pre></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="27"></td><td><pre><span class="token comment"># 创建软链接</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="28"></td><td><pre><span class="token function">ln</span> -sv /usr/local/openssl/bin/openssl /usr/bin/openssl</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="29"></td><td><pre><span class="token function">ln</span> -sv /usr/local/openssl/include/openssl /usr/include/openssl</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="30"></td><td><pre></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="31"></td><td><pre><span class="token comment"># 设置动态库地址</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="32"></td><td><pre><span class="token builtin class-name">echo</span> <span class="token string">'/usr/local/openssl/lib'</span> <span class="token operator">></span> /etc/ld.so.conf.d/openssl-ld.conf</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="33"></td><td><pre>ldconfig -v</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="34"></td><td><pre></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="35"></td><td><pre><span class="token comment"># 查看版本</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="36"></td><td><pre>openssl version</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="37"></td><td><pre> OpenSSL <span class="token number">1.1</span>.1j <span class="token number">16</span> Feb <span class="token number">2021</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="38"></td><td><pre></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="39"></td><td><pre><span class="token comment"># 查看某个证书信息</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="40"></td><td><pre>openssl x509 -in public.crt -text -noout</pre></td></tr></table></figure><p>升级完成， 最好重启下服务器.</p><h2 id="debian9上更新openssl"><a class="anchor" href="#debian9上更新openssl">#</a> debian9 上更新 Openssl</h2><figure class="highlight shell"><figcaption data-lang="Bash"><span>l</span></figcaption><table><tr><td data-num="1"></td><td><pre><span class="token comment"># 当前版本</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="2"></td><td><pre><span class="token comment"># openssl version</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="3"></td><td><pre>OpenSSL <span class="token number">1.0</span>.2k-fips <span class="token number">26</span> Jan <span class="token number">2017</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="4"></td><td><pre></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="5"></td><td><pre><span class="token comment"># 删除旧版本包</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="6"></td><td><pre><span class="token function">apt-get</span> --purge remove openssl</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="7"></td><td><pre></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="8"></td><td><pre><span class="token comment"># 安装依赖</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="9"></td><td><pre><span class="token function">apt-get</span> update</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="10"></td><td><pre><span class="token function">apt-get</span> <span class="token function">install</span> build-essential checkinstall zlib1g-dev -y</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="11"></td><td><pre></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="12"></td><td><pre><span class="token comment"># 下载包</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="13"></td><td><pre><span class="token function">wget</span> https://www.openssl.org/source/openssl-1.1.1d.tar.gz</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="14"></td><td><pre><span class="token function">tar</span> -zxf openssl-1.1.1d.tar.gz </pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="15"></td><td><pre></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="16"></td><td><pre><span class="token comment"># 编译</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="17"></td><td><pre><span class="token builtin class-name">cd</span> ./openssl-1.1.1d/</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="18"></td><td><pre>./config --prefix<span class="token operator">=</span>/usr/local/openssl shared zlib</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="19"></td><td><pre><span class="token function">make</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="20"></td><td><pre><span class="token function">make</span> <span class="token function">install</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="21"></td><td><pre></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="22"></td><td><pre><span class="token comment"># 创建软链接</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="23"></td><td><pre><span class="token function">ln</span> -sv /usr/local/openssl/bin/openssl /usr/bin/openssl</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="24"></td><td><pre><span class="token function">ln</span> -sv /usr/local/openssl/include/openssl /usr/include/openssl</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="25"></td><td><pre></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="26"></td><td><pre><span class="token comment"># 设置动态库地址</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="27"></td><td><pre><span class="token builtin class-name">echo</span> <span class="token string">'/usr/local/openssl/lib'</span> <span class="token operator">></span> /etc/ld.so.conf.d/openssl-ld.conf</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="28"></td><td><pre>ldconfig -v</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="29"></td><td><pre></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="30"></td><td><pre><span class="token comment"># 查看版本</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="31"></td><td><pre>openssl version</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="32"></td><td><pre>OpenSSL <span class="token number">1.1</span>.1d <span class="token number">10</span> Sep <span class="token number">2019</span></pre></td></tr></table></figure><p>升级完成， 最好重启下服务器。</p><!-- rebuild by hrmmi -->

item.title: 05 Deploy MinIO with KMS(vault)
item.description:
<!-- build time:Tue Mar 23 2021 20:14:34 GMT+0800 (中国标准时间) --><h2 id="总览"><a class="anchor" href="#总览">#</a> 总览</h2><p>Vault, Consul, MinIO 部署在 K8s.<br>KES 部署在本地.</p><h2 id="referenc-link"><a class="anchor" href="#referenc-link">#</a> referenc link</h2><p><span class="exturl" data-url="aHR0cHM6Ly9naXRodWIuY29tL21pbmlvL2tlcy93aWtp">https://github.com/minio/kes/wiki</span><br><span class="exturl" data-url="aHR0cHM6Ly9naXRodWIuY29tL21pbmlvL2tlcy93aWtpL0hhc2hpY29ycC1WYXVsdC1LZXlzdG9yZQ==">https://github.com/minio/kes/wiki/Hashicorp-Vault-Keystore</span><br><span class="exturl" data-url="aHR0cHM6Ly9naXRodWIuY29tL21pbmlvL2tlcy93aWtpL01pbklPLU9iamVjdC1TdG9yYWdlI21pbmlvLWNvbmZpZ3VyYXRpb24=">https://github.com/minio/kes/wiki/MinIO-Object-Storage#minio-configuration</span><br><span class="exturl" data-url="aHR0cHM6Ly9naXRodWIuY29tL21pbmlvL21pbmlvL2Jsb2IvbWFzdGVyL2RvY3Mva21zL1JFQURNRS5tZA==">https://github.com/minio/minio/blob/master/docs/kms/README.md</span></p><p><a id="more"></a></p><p><span class="exturl" data-url="aHR0cHM6Ly9kb2NzLm1pbi5pby9kb2NzL21pbmlvLXNlY3VyaXR5LW92ZXJ2aWV3Lmh0bWw=">https://docs.min.io/docs/minio-security-overview.html</span><br><span class="exturl" data-url="aHR0cDovL2RvY3MubWluaW8ub3JnLmNuL2RvY3MvbWFzdGVyL21pbmlvLWttcy1xdWlja3N0YXJ0LWd1aWRl">http://docs.minio.org.cn/docs/master/minio-kms-quickstart-guide</span><br><span class="exturl" data-url="aHR0cHM6Ly9kb2NzLm1pbi5pby9kb2NzL21pbmlvLWNsaWVudC1xdWlja3N0YXJ0LWd1aWRl">https://docs.min.io/docs/minio-client-quickstart-guide</span></p><p><span class="exturl" data-url="aHR0cHM6Ly9ibG9nLmNzZG4ubmV0L3BldGVyd2FuZ2hhby9hcnRpY2xlL2RldGFpbHMvODMxODE5MzI=">https://blog.csdn.net/peterwanghao/article/details/83181932</span></p><p>valut:<br><span class="exturl" data-url="aHR0cHM6Ly9sZWFybi5oYXNoaWNvcnAuY29tL3R1dG9yaWFscy92YXVsdC9oYS13aXRoLWNvbnN1bD9pbj12YXVsdC9vcGVyYXRpb25z">https://learn.hashicorp.com/tutorials/vault/ha-with-consul?in=vault/operations</span></p><h2 id="概念"><a class="anchor" href="#概念">#</a> 概念</h2><p>MinIO 使用密钥管理系统（KMS）支持 SSE-S3。如果客户端请求 SSE-S3，或 启用了自动加密，则 MinIO 服务器会使用唯一的对象密钥对每个对象进行加密，该对象密钥受 KMS 管理的主密钥保护。</p><p>KMS 将 MinIO 作为面向应用程序的存储系统与安全密钥存储区分开，并且 可以由专门的安全团队进行管理。MinIO 通过我们的 KES project 支持常用的 KMS 实现，例如 Hashicorp Vault。 通过 KES，可以利用存储基础架构（MinIO 群集）水平扩展 KMS。 通常，MinIO-KMS 基础结构如下所示：</p><pre><code> ┌─────────┐ ┌────────────┐ ┌─────────┐ │ MinIO ├─────────┤ KES Server ├─────────┤ KMS │ └─────────┘ └────────────┘ └─────────┘ </code></pre><p>当您将存储基础架构扩展到多个 MinIO 群集时，您的架构应如下所示：</p><pre><code> ┌────────────┐ │ ┌──────────┴─┬─────╮ ┌────────────┐ └─┤ ┌──────────┴─┬───┴──────────┤ ┌──────────┴─┬─────────────────╮ └─┤ ┌──────────┴─┬─────┬──────┴─┤ KES Server ├─────────────────┤ └─┤ MinIO ├─────╯ └────────────┘ ┌────┴────┐ └────────────┘ │ KMS │ └─────────┘ </code></pre><p><strong><code>请注意</code> </strong>，所有 MinIO 群集均仅具有 <strong><code>其自己的</code> </strong>KES 实例的连接，而不能直接访问 Vault（作为一种可能的 KMS 实现）。 每个 KES 实例将处理 “其” MinIO 群集发出的所有加密 / 解密请求，从而使中央 KMS 实现不必处理 大量流量。相反，每个 KES 实例都将使用中央 KMS 实现作为安全密钥存储，并从中获取所需的主密钥。</p><p>该指南显示了如何使用 Hashicorp Vault 作为 KMS 实施来设置 MinIO-KMS 部署。 因此，它显示了如何设置和配置：</p><ul><li>Vault 服务器作为中央密钥库。</li><li>一个 KES 服务器实例，作为 MinIO 和保险柜之间的中间件。</li><li>MinIO 实例本身。</li></ul><div class="note info"><p><strong><code>请注意,</code> </strong>为简便起见，本指南使用自签名证书。在生产部署中，应使用 由<span class="blue"> “公共”</span>（例如，让我们加密）或组织内部的 CA 颁发的 X.509 证书。</p></div><p>本指南说明如何在同一台计算机上设置三台不同的服务器：</p><ul><li>Vault 服务器为 <span class="exturl" data-url="aHR0cHM6Ly8xMjcuMC4wLjE6ODIwMA==">https://127.0.0.1:8200</span></li><li>KES 服务器为 <span class="exturl" data-url="aHR0cHM6Ly8xMjcuMC4wLjE6NzM3Mw==">https://127.0.0.1:7373</span></li><li>MinIO 在 K8s 上部署后 9000 映射到主机端口位 30007, 则服务器为 <span class="exturl" data-url="aHR0cHM6Ly8xMjcuMC4wLjE6MzAwMDc=">https://127.0.0.1:30007</span></li></ul><h2 id="先决条件"><a class="anchor" href="#先决条件">#</a> 先决条件</h2><p>安装 MinIO，KES 和 Vault。对于 MinIO，请参阅 MinIO 快速入门指南。然后安装 KES 并下载 适用于您的操作系统和平台的最新 Vault 二进制文件.</p><h3 id="vault"><a class="anchor" href="#vault">#</a> * Vault:</h3><figure class="highlight bash"><figcaption data-lang="bash"><span>h 命令行提示符</span></figcaption><table><tr class="marked"><td data-num="1"></td><td data-command="$"></td><td><pre><span class="token function">wget</span> https://releases.hashicorp.com/vault/1.7.0-rc1/vault_1.7.0-rc1_linux_amd64.zip</pre></td></tr><tr class="marked"><td data-num="2"></td><td data-command="$"></td><td><pre><span class="token function">unzip</span> vault_1.7.0-rc1_linux_amd64.zip</pre></td></tr><tr class="marked"><td data-num="3"></td><td data-command="$"></td><td><pre><span class="token function">mv</span> vault /usr/local/bin/ <span class="token comment"># 如果 cp 过去的话，下面启动 vault server 时候自动创建的 vault 文件夹会与此已存在的 vault 二进制文件冲突，因此直接 move 过去.</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="4"></td><td data-command=""></td><td><pre></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="5"></td><td data-command="#"></td><td><pre><span class="token comment"># vault 可以在 Linux 系统上使用 mlock syscall 来防止 OS 将内存中的数据写入磁盘（交换）</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="6"></td><td data-command="$"></td><td><pre><span class="token function">sudo</span> setcap <span class="token assign-left variable">cap_ipc_lock</span><span class="token operator">=</span>+ep <span class="token variable"><span class="token variable">$(</span>readlink -f <span class="token punctuation">$(</span>which vault<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token variable">)</span></span></pre></td></tr></table></figure><h3 id="kes"><a class="anchor" href="#kes">#</a> * KES:</h3><p><span class="exturl" data-url="aHR0cHM6Ly9naXRodWIuY29tL21pbmlvL2tlcyNiaW5hcnktcmVsZWFzZXM=">https://github.com/minio/kes#binary-releases</span></p><pre><code>wget https://github.com/minio/kes/releases/latest/download/kes-linux-amd64 mv kes-linux-amd64 kes chmod +x kes cp kes /usr/local/bin/ kes -h
# KES 可以在Linux系统上使用 mlock syscall 来防止 OS 将内存中的数据写入磁盘（交换） sudo setcap cap_ipc_lock=+ep $(readlink -f $(which kes)) </code></pre><h3 id="minio"><a class="anchor" href="#minio">#</a> * MinIO：</h3><pre><code>wget https://dl.min.io/server/minio/release/linux-amd64/minio chmod +x minio cp minio /usr/local/bin/ </code></pre><h3 id="mc"><a class="anchor" href="#mc">#</a> * mc:</h3><pre><code>wget https://dl.min.io/client/mc/release/linux-amd64/mc chmod +x mc ./mc --help </code></pre><h2 id="机器配置"><a class="anchor" href="#机器配置">#</a> 机器配置</h2><table><thead><tr><th style="text-align:left">IP</th><th style="text-align:left">机器名</th><th style="text-align:left">用途</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td style="text-align:left">10.239.140.73</td><td style="text-align:left">master</td><td style="text-align:left">K8S 集群节点，master (去除污点), 部署 KMS, KES 到本机，MinIO 部署到 K8S 集群</td></tr><tr><td style="text-align:left">10.239.131.157</td><td style="text-align:left">laboratory</td><td style="text-align:left">K8S 集群节点，master (去除污点)</td></tr></tbody></table><p>openssl 版本：</p><pre><code>$ openssl version OpenSSL 1.0.2k-fips 26 Jan 2017 built on: reproducible build, date unspecified platform: linux-x86_64 options: bn(64,64) md2(int) rc4(16x,int) des(idx,cisc,16,int) idea(int) blowfish(idx) compiler: gcc -I. -I.. -I../include -fPIC -DOPENSSL_PIC -DZLIB -DOPENSSL_THREADS -D_REENTRANT -DDSO_DLFCN -DHAVE_DLFCN_H -DKRB5_MIT -m64 -DL_ENDIAN -Wall -O2 -g -pipe -Wall -Wp,-D_FORTIFY_SOURCE=2 -fexceptions -fstack-protector-strong --param=ssp-buffer-size=4 -grecord-gcc-switches -m64 -mtune=generic -Wa,--noexecstack -DPURIFY -DOPENSSL_IA32_SSE2 -DOPENSSL_BN_ASM_MONT -DOPENSSL_BN_ASM_MONT5 -DOPENSSL_BN_ASM_GF2m -DRC4_ASM -DSHA1_ASM -DSHA256_ASM -DSHA512_ASM -DMD5_ASM -DAES_ASM -DVPAES_ASM -DBSAES_ASM -DWHIRLPOOL_ASM -DGHASH_ASM -DECP_NISTZ256_ASM OPENSSLDIR: &quot;/etc/pki/tls&quot; engines: rdrand dynamic </code></pre><h2 id="kmsvault"><a class="anchor" href="#kmsvault">#</a> KMS(Vault)</h2><h3 id="为保险柜生成tls证书"><a class="anchor" href="#为保险柜生成tls证书">#</a> 为保险柜生成 TLS 证书</h3><p>vault-crt.conf</p><pre><code>[req] distinguished_name = req_distinguished_name x509_extensions = v3_req prompt = no
[req_distinguished_name] C = US ST = state L = location O = organization CN = localhost
[v3_req] subjectAltName = @alt_names
[alt_names] [alt_names] IP.1 = 127.0.0.1 IP.2 = 10.239.140.73 DNS.1 = localhost DNS.2 = master </code></pre><p>生成证书</p><pre><code># 使用ECDSA生成密钥 openssl ecparam -genkey -name prime256v1 | openssl ec -out vault-tls.key openssl req -new -x509 -nodes -days 30 -key vault-tls.key -sha384 -out vault-tls.crt -config vault-crt.conf
# 使用RSA生成密钥 openssl genrsa -out vault-tls.key 2048 openssl req -new -x509 -nodes -days 30 -key private.key -sha384 -out vault-tls.crt -config vault-crt.conf </code></pre><p>查看密钥和证书</p><pre><code># 查看ecdsa生成的密钥 openssl ec -in vault-tls.key -text -noout # 查看rsa生成的密钥 openssl rsa -in vault-tls.key -text -noout
(Optional)# 查看csr (Optional)openssl req -in root-cert.csr -text -noout
# 查看证书 openssl x509 -in vault-tls.crt -text -noout </code></pre><h3 id="创建保管库配置文件"><a class="anchor" href="#创建保管库配置文件">#</a> 创建保管库配置文件</h3><pre><code>cat &gt; vault-config.json &lt;&lt;EOF { &quot;api_addr&quot;: &quot;https://127.0.0.1:8200&quot;, &quot;backend&quot;: { &quot;file&quot;: { &quot;path&quot;: &quot;vault/file&quot; } }, &quot;default_lease_ttl&quot;: &quot;168h&quot;, &quot;max_lease_ttl&quot;: &quot;720h&quot;, &quot;listener&quot;: { &quot;tcp&quot;: { &quot;address&quot;: &quot;0.0.0.0:8200&quot;, &quot;tls_cert_file&quot;: &quot;vault-tls.crt&quot;, &quot;tls_key_file&quot;: &quot;vault-tls.key&quot;, &quot;tls_min_version&quot;: &quot;tls12&quot; } } } EOF </code></pre><p>请注意，我们使用文件后端运行 Vault。为了获得高可用性，您可能需要使用其他 后端，例如<span class="exturl" data-url="aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cudmF1bHRwcm9qZWN0LmlvL2RvY3MvY29uZmlndXJhdGlvbi9zdG9yYWdlL2V0Y2Q="> etcd</span> 或<span class="exturl" data-url="aHR0cHM6Ly9sZWFybi5oYXNoaWNvcnAuY29tL3R1dG9yaWFscy92YXVsdC9oYS13aXRoLWNvbnN1bA=="> consul</span>.</p><h3 id="启动vault服务器"><a class="anchor" href="#启动vault服务器">#</a> 启动 Vault 服务器：</h3><p>启动 vault server, 测试完终止后，下次直接运行此命令重启 vault server, 再用下面 三条 unseal 命令解封即可.</p><pre><code>vault server -config vault-config.json </code></pre><h3 id="初始化和解封保管箱"><a class="anchor" href="#初始化和解封保管箱">#</a> 初始化和解封保管箱</h3><p>切换终端，在单独的终端窗口中设置环境 VAULT_ADDR。保险柜服务器的变量:</p><pre><code>export VAULT_ADDR='https://127.0.0.1:8200' // 如果Vault使用自签名TLS 证书，则可能要运行如下命令, 当Vault提供 由计算机信任的CA颁发的TLS证书（例如，让我们加密）时，则无需运行此命令. export VAULT_SKIP_VERIFY=true // 初始化保险柜 vault operator init </code></pre><p><strong><code>保管箱将打印n（默认情况下为5）解封密钥共享，其中至少m（至少3） 为重新生成实际解封密钥才能解封保管库.</code> </strong>因此，请务必 记住它们。特别是，请将那些未密封的密钥共享放在安全且持久的位置<br>您应该看到类似于以下内容的输出：</p><pre><code>CopyUnseal Key 1: eyW/+8ZtsgT81Cb0e8OVxzJAQP5lY7Dcamnze+JnWEDT Unseal Key 2: 0tZn+7QQCxphpHwTm6/dC3LpP5JGIbYl6PK8Sy79R+P2 Unseal Key 3: cmhs+AUMXUuB6Lzsvgcbp3bRT6VDGQjgCBwB2xm0ANeF Unseal Key 4: /fTPpec5fWpGqWHK+uhnnTNMQyAbl5alUi4iq2yNgyqj Unseal Key 5: UPdDVPto+H6ko+20NKmagK40MOskqOBw4y/S51WpgVy/
Initial Root Token: s.zaU4Gbcu0Wh46uj2V3VuUde0
Vault is initialized with 5 key shares and a key threshold of 3. Please securely distribute the key shares printed above. When the Vault is re-sealed, restarted, or stopped, you must supply at least 3 of these keys to unseal it before it can start servicing requests.
Vault does not store the generated master key. Without at least 3 key to reconstruct the master key, Vault will remain permanently sealed!
It is possible to generate new unseal keys, provided you have a quorum of existing unseal keys shares. See &quot;vault operator rekey&quot; for more information. </code></pre><p>设置环境，变量 <strong><code>VAULT_TOKEN</code> </strong>到命令之前打印的根令牌</p><pre><code>export VAULT_TOKEN=s.zaU4Gbcu0Wh46uj2V3VuUde0 </code></pre><p>然后，使用任何先前生成的密钥共享来打开 Vault 的密封.</p><pre><code>vault operator unseal eyW/+8ZtsgT81Cb0e8OVxzJAQP5lY7Dcamnze+JnWEDT vault operator unseal 0tZn+7QQCxphpHwTm6/dC3LpP5JGIbYl6PK8Sy79R+P2 vault operator unseal cmhs+AUMXUuB6Lzsvgcbp3bRT6VDGQjgCBwB2xm0ANeF </code></pre><p>提交足够的有效密钥共享后，保管箱将被解封 并能够处理请求。</p><h3 id="启用保险柜的kv后端"><a class="anchor" href="#启用保险柜的kv后端">#</a> 启用保险柜的 K/V 后端.</h3><p>加密主密钥（而不是对象加密密钥）将存储 在 Vault 中。因此，我们需要启用 Vault 的 K/V 后端。为此，请运行：</p><pre><code>vault secrets enable kv </code></pre><p>为 K/V 引擎 创建访问策略.<br>以下策略确定应用程序（即 KES 服务器）如​​何 与 Vault 交互.</p><pre><code>cat &gt; minio-kes-policy.hcl &lt;&lt;EOF path &quot;kv/minio/*&quot; { capabilities = [ &quot;create&quot;, &quot;read&quot;, &quot;delete&quot; ] } EOF </code></pre><p>观察在 <strong><code>kv/minio/*</code> </strong>的路径前缀 <strong><code>minio</code> </strong>, 此前缀确保 KES 服务器只能在 <strong><code>minio/-</code> </strong>下进行读取，而只能在 - 下进行写入 <code>some-app/</code> . 如何在 K/V 引擎上分隔域取决于您的基础结构 和安全要求。</p><p>然后，我们将政策上传到保险柜：</p><pre><code>vault policy write minio-key-policy ./minio-kes-policy.hcl </code></pre><h3 id="启用approle身份验证"><a class="anchor" href="#启用approle身份验证">#</a> 启用 AppRole 身份验证</h3><p>由于我们希望稍后将一个 / 多个 KES 服务器连接到 Vault，因此必须启用 AppRole 身份验证。为此，请运行：</p><pre><code>vault auth enable approle </code></pre><p>创建一个新的 AppRole ID 并将其绑定到策略.<br>创建一个新的 AppRole ID 并授予该 ID 特定的权限。 该应用程序（即 KES 服务器）将通过 AppRole 角色 ID 和机密 ID 向 Vault 进行身份验证，并且仅允许执行特定策略授予的操作.</p><pre><code># 我们首先为KES服务器创建一个新角色: vault write auth/approle/role/kes-role token_num_uses=0 secret_id_num_uses=0 period=5m
# 然后，我们将策略绑定到角色： vault write auth/approle/role/kes-role policies=minio-key-policy
# 最后，我们从Vault请求AppRole角色ID和秘密ID。 首先是角色ID： vault read auth/approle/role/kes-role/role-id fe46e329-bb70-2342-9fac-f3964a447d07
# 然后是秘密ID： vault write -f auth/approle/role/kes-role/secret-id 50646d24-5589-bba9-3f99-15ef2ae7e100 </code></pre><p>我们只对 secret_id 感兴趣，不包括 secret_id_accessor.</p><h2 id="kes-2"><a class="anchor" href="#kes-2">#</a> KES</h2><h3 id="生成kes证书和私钥"><a class="anchor" href="#生成kes证书和私钥">#</a> 生成 KES 证书和私钥</h3><p><strong><code>此部署文档将Kes和MinIO共用相同的private.key和public.crt</code></strong><br>上面私匙和证书名字不要改变，因为 MinIO 的私匙和证书必须是 private.key 和 public.crt,</p><p>kes-minio-crt.conf:</p><pre><code>[req] distinguished_name = req_distinguished_name x509_extensions = v3_req prompt = no
[req_distinguished_name] C = US ST = state L = location O = organization CN = localhost
[v3_req] subjectAltName = @alt_names
[alt_names] IP.1 = 127.0.0.1 IP.2 = 10.239.140.73 DNS.1 = *.minio-hl-svc.minio.svc.cluster.local DNS.2 = master DNS.3 = localhost </code></pre><p>连接到 KES 服务器（mTLS）时，每个用户或应用程序必须出示有效的 X.509 证书。 KES 服务器将接受 / 拒绝连接尝试，并根据证书应用策略。</p><p>因此，每个 MinIO 群集都需要一个 X.509 TLS 证书来进行客户端身份验证。可以通过运行以下命令来创建 MinIO（自签名）证书.</p><pre><code># 使用ECDSA生成密钥 openssl ecparam -genkey -name prime256v1 | openssl ec -out minio-pki/private.key openssl req -new -x509 -nodes -days 730 -key minio-pki/private.key -sha384 -out minio-pki/public.crt -config kes-minio-crt.conf
# 使用RSA生成密钥 openssl genrsa -out private.key 2048 openssl req -new -x509 -nodes -days 730 -key minio-pki/private.key -out minio-pki/public.crt -config kes-minio-crt.conf
# KES和MinIO共用相同的证书和私钥, 因此拷贝一份MinIO密钥和证书给KES用: cp minio-pki/private.key ./kes-server.key cp minio-pki/public.crt ./kes-server.crt </code></pre><p>注意，MinIO 是<span class="exturl" data-url="aHR0cHM6Ly9lbi53aWtpcGVkaWEub3JnL3dpa2kvWC41MDkjU3RydWN0dXJlX29mX2FfY2VydGlmaWNhdGU="> subject name</span>。 您可以为您的部署方案选择一个更合适的名称。此外，对于生产部署，我们 建议获取由 CA 颁发的用于客户端身份验证的 TLS 证书。</p><p>要获取 MinIO 的 X.509 证书的身份，请运行：</p><pre><code>kes tool identity of minio-pki/public.crt # 此命令可与任何（有效）X.509证书一起使用-无论如何创建它-并 产生类似于以下内容的输出： Identity: dd46485bedc9ad2909d2e8f9017216eec4413bc5c64b236d992f7ec19c843c5f
# 设置环境变量 export APP_IDENTITY=dd46485bedc9ad2909d2e8f9017216eec4413bc5c64b236d992f7ec19c843c5f </code></pre><h3 id="创建kes配置文件"><a class="anchor" href="#创建kes配置文件">#</a> 创建 KES 配置文件</h3><p>创建 KES 配置文件并启动 KES 服务器.</p><pre><code>cat &gt; kes-server-config.yml &lt;&lt;EOF address: 0.0.0.0:7373 root: disabled # We disable the root identity since we don't need it in this guide
tls: key: kes-server.key cert: kes-server.crt
policy: my-app: paths: - /v1/key/create/minio-* - /v1/key/generate/minio-* - /v1/key/decrypt/minio-* identities: - ${APP_IDENTITY}
cache: expiry: any: 5m0s unused: 20s
keys: vault: endpoint: https://127.0.0.1:8200 prefix: minio approle: id: &quot;fe46e329-bb70-2342-9fac-f3964a447d07&quot; # Your AppRole ID: $ vault read auth/approle/role/kes-role/role-id secret: &quot;50646d24-5589-bba9-3f99-15ef2ae7e100&quot; # Your AppRole Secret ID: $ vault write -f auth/approle/role/kes-role/secret-id retry: 15s status: ping: 10s tls: ca: &quot;vault-tls.crt&quot; # Since we use self-signed certificates
EOF </code></pre><p>请 identities 在 policy 部分中将的值更改为您的身份 minio-pki/public.crt, 或者在终端运行 <strong><code>export APP_IDENTITY=dd46485bedc9ad2909d2e8f9017216eec4413bc5c64b236d992f7ec19c843c5f</code></strong><br>另外，插入您在保险柜设置过程中之前创建的 AppRole 角色 ID 和密码 ID。 您可以<span class="exturl" data-url="aHR0cHM6Ly9naXRodWIuY29tL21pbmlvL2tlcy9ibG9iL21hc3Rlci9zZXJ2ZXItY29uZmlnLnlhbWw=">在此处</span>找到包含所有可用参数的文档化配置文件.</p><p>最后，通过以下方式启动 KES 服务器：</p><pre><code>kes server --mlock --config=kes-server-config.yml --auth=off </code></pre><p><strong><code>--auth=off</code> </strong>is required since our root.cert and app.cert certificates are self-signed.<br>The <strong><code>--mlock</code> </strong>option is currently only available on Linux.</p><p>有关 KES 访问控制模型和身份验证的更多信息:<span class="exturl" data-url="aHR0cHM6Ly9naXRodWIuY29tL21pbmlvL2tlcy93aWtpL0NvbmNlcHRz">KES Concepts</span></p><h3 id="创建一个新的主密钥"><a class="anchor" href="#创建一个新的主密钥">#</a> 创建一个新的主密钥</h3><p>在继续进行 MinIO 设置之前，我们需要创建一个新的主密钥。因此，我们使用 MinIO 身份和 KES CLI。</p><p>在新的终端窗口中，通过以下方式成为 MinIO 身份：</p><pre><code>export KES_CLIENT_CERT=minio-pki/public.crt export KES_CLIENT_KEY=minio-pki/private.key </code></pre><p>然后运行以下命令来创建主密钥：</p><pre><code># 设置访问vault变量: export VAULT_SKIP_VERIFY=true export VAULT_TOKEN=s.zaU4Gbcu0Wh46uj2V3VuUde0
# 创建主密钥: kes key create -k minio-key-1
# 查看所有key-value文件夹 vault kv list kv/ Keys ---- minio/ test01
# 查看某个文件夹下有哪些主密钥 vault kv list kv/minio Keys ---- minio-key-1 minio-key-2
# 获取某个主密钥数据信息 vault kv get kv/minio/minio-key-1 ======= Data ======= Key Value --- ----- minio-key-1 {&quot;bytes&quot;:&quot;rrjxB3THaSzSGaJ2mUwWDjT/+Tvgb5XbECPi3P9rgBs=&quot;}
</code></pre><p>由于我们使用自签名证书，因此仅需要 <strong><code>-k</code> </strong>标志.<br>另外，请注意，基于服务器配置文件， 仅允许 MinIO 标识创建 / 使用以开头的主密钥 <code>minio-</code> . 因此，尝试创建密钥（例如） <code>kes key create my-key-1 -k</code> 将失败，并出现策略错误禁止的消息.</p><h2 id="minio-2"><a class="anchor" href="#minio-2">#</a> MinIO</h2><p>minio 的证书和私钥请参考上面 KES 生成 minio-pki/private.key 和 minio-pki/public.crt 步骤.</p><p>MinIO 服务器将需要知道 KES 服务器端点， 用于身份验证和授权的 mTLS 客户端证书以及默认的主密钥名称.</p><h3 id="搭建本地minio服务"><a class="anchor" href="#搭建本地minio服务">#</a> 搭建本地 minio 服务</h3><p>MinIO 服务器将需要知道 KES 服务器端点， 用于身份验证和授权的 mTLS 客户端证书以及默认的主密钥名称.</p><pre><code>export MINIO_KMS_KES_ENDPOINT=https://10.239.140.73:7373 export MINIO_KMS_KES_CERT_FILE=minio-pki/public.crt export MINIO_KMS_KES_KEY_FILE=minio-pki/private.key export MINIO_KMS_KES_CA_PATH=kes-server.crt export MINIO_KMS_KES_KEY_NAME=minio-key-1 </code></pre><p>由于我们使用自签名证书，因此只需要 ** <code>MINIO_KMS_KES_CA_PATH</code> **</p><p>然后启动 MinIO 服务器：</p><pre><code>export MINIO_ACCESS_KEY=minio export MINIO_SECRET_KEY=minio123 rm -rf /root/.mc rm -rf /root/.minio minio server --certs-dir ./minio-pki ./data * 指定上传minio server端证书存放路径文件夹为: ./minio-pki * minio存储的数据保存到data目录 </code></pre><p>切换终端，启动自动加密，如果在 K8S 上部署 MinIO server enable 了密钥和证书，则执行下面类似命令时候都要加上 <strong><code>--insecure</code> </strong>, 信任自签的证书.</p><pre><code># 设置server服务地址 mc alias set myminio https://10.239.140.73:9000 minio minio123 --insecure
# 创建bucket mc mb myminio/test01 --insecure
# 加密minio 已存在的某个 bucket mc encrypt set sse-s3 myminio/test01/ --insecure mc encrypt info myminio/test01/ --insecure Auto encryption 'sse-s3' is enabled
# 将本地文件synk.jpg上传到minio mc cp synk.jpg myminio/test01/ --insecure
# 查看上传文件状态, 可以看到已自动加密 mc stat myminio/test01/synk.jpg --insecure Name : synk.jpg Date : 2021-03-15 11:54:36 CST Size : 112 B ETag : 2ced7fb62d324c643aeb21eccbe86eeb Type : file Metadata : Content-Type: application/x-sh Encrypted : X-Amz-Server-Side-Encryption: AES256
# 将上传的文件下载到本地 mc cp myminio/test01/synk.jpg 001.jpg --insecure </code></pre><h3 id="k8s上搭建minio"><a class="anchor" href="#k8s上搭建minio">#</a> k8s 上搭建 minio</h3><h4 id="所有文件"><a class="anchor" </code></pre></div></details><h4 id="minio证书"><a class="anchor" href="#minio证书">#</a> minio 证书</h4><p>minio 证书跟上面的 KES 一致，可以直接复制上面的 KES 证书，或者用下面命令生成.</p><figure class="highlight shell"><figcaption data-lang="Bash"><span>l</span></figcaption><table><tr><td data-num="1"></td><td><pre><span class="token comment"># 使用 ECDSA 生成 MinIO 密钥</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="2"></td><td><pre>openssl ecparam -genkey -name prime256v1 <span class="token operator">|</span> openssl ec -out pki/private.key</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="3"></td><td><pre>openssl req -new -x509 -nodes -days <span class="token number">730</span> -key pki/private.key -sha384 -out pki/public.crt -config minio-crt.conf</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="4"></td><td><pre></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="5"></td><td><pre><span class="token comment"># 使用 RSA 生成 MinIO 密钥</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="6"></td><td><pre>openssl genrsa -out private.key <span class="token number">2048</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="7"></td><td><pre>openssl req -new -x509 -nodes -days <span class="token number">730</span> -key pki/private.key -out pki/public.crt -config minio-crt.conf</pre></td></tr></table></figure><h4 id="数据存放目录"><a class="anchor" href="#数据存放目录">#</a> 数据存放目录</h4><figure class="highlight shell"><figcaption data-lang="Bash"><span>l</span></figcaption><table><tr><td data-num="1"></td><td><pre>./mkdir_minio_node.sh</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="2"></td><td><pre></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="3"></td><td><pre><span class="token comment"># 登陆到各个部署 minio 的机器，mount MinIO 的数据存放目录到指定磁盘</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="4"></td><td><pre><span class="token function">mount</span> /dev/sd* /mnt/minio_data</pre></td></tr></table></figure><h4 id="部署"><a class="anchor" href="#部署">#</a> 部署</h4><figure class="highlight shell"><figcaption data-lang="Bash"><span>l</span></figcaption><table><tr><td data-num="1"></td><td><pre>./build_minio.sh</pre></td></tr></table></figure><h4 id="查看"><a class="anchor" href="#查看">#</a> 查看</h4><figure class="highlight shell"><figcaption data-lang="Bash"><span>l</span></figcaption><table><tr><td data-num="1"></td><td><pre>kubectl get po -n minio</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="2"></td><td><pre> NAME READY STATUS RESTARTS AGE</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="3"></td><td><pre> minio-0 <span class="token number">1</span>/1 Running <span class="token number">0</span> 6d23h</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="4"></td><td><pre> minio-1 <span class="token number">1</span>/1 Running <span class="token number">0</span> 6d23h</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="5"></td><td><pre> minio-2 <span class="token number">1</span>/1 Running <span class="token number">0</span> 6d23h</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="6"></td><td><pre> minio-3 <span class="token number">1</span>/1 Running <span class="token number">0</span> 6d23h</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="7"></td><td><pre> minio-operator-54d8bd774b-4h9sm <span class="token number">1</span>/1 Running <span class="token number">0</span> 6d23h</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="8"></td><td><pre></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="9"></td><td><pre></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="10"></td><td><pre>kubectl logs po/minio-0 -n minio</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="11"></td><td><pre> <span class="token punctuation">..</span><span class="token punctuation">..</span><span class="token punctuation">..</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="12"></td><td><pre> Formatting 1st zone, <span class="token number">1</span> set<span class="token punctuation">(</span>s<span class="token punctuation">)</span>, <span class="token number">4</span> drives per set.</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="13"></td><td><pre> Waiting <span class="token keyword">for</span> all MinIO sub-systems to be initialized<span class="token punctuation">..</span> lock acquired</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="14"></td><td><pre> Attempting encryption of all config, IAM <span class="token function">users</span> and policies on MinIO backend</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="15"></td><td><pre> All MinIO sub-systems initialized successfully</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="16"></td><td><pre> Status: <span class="token number">4</span> Online, <span class="token number">0</span> Offline.</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="17"></td><td><pre> Endpoint: https://10.32.0.11:9000 https://127.0.0.1:9000</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="18"></td><td><pre> </pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="19"></td><td><pre> Browser Access:</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="20"></td><td><pre> https://10.32.0.11:9000 https://127.0.0.1:9000</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="21"></td><td><pre> </pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="22"></td><td><pre> Object API <span class="token punctuation">(</span>Amazon S3 compatible<span class="token punctuation">)</span>:</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="23"></td><td><pre> Go: https://docs.min.io/docs/golang-client-quickstart-guide</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="24"></td><td><pre> Java: https://docs.min.io/docs/java-client-quickstart-guide</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="25"></td><td><pre> Python: https://docs.min.io/docs/python-client-quickstart-guide</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="26"></td><td><pre> JavaScript: https://docs.min.io/docs/javascript-client-quickstart-guide</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="27"></td><td><pre> .NET: https://docs.min.io/docs/dotnet-client-quickstart-guide</pre></td></tr></table></figure><h4 id="上传下载"><a class="anchor" href="#上传下载">#</a> 上传下载</h4><p>跟上面在本地搭建的 minio 服务操作几乎一样，就是把 MinIO server 端的 9000 端口换成 30007.</p><pre><code># 设置server服务地址 mc alias set myminio https://10.239.140.73:30007 minio minio123 --insecure
# 创建bucket mc mb myminio/test01 --insecure
# 加密minio 已存在的某个 bucket mc encrypt set sse-s3 myminio/test01/ --insecure mc encrypt info myminio/test01/ --insecure Auto encryption 'sse-s3' is enabled
# 将本地文件synk.jpg上传到minio mc cp synk.jpg myminio/test01/ --insecure
# 查看上传文件状态, 可以看到已自动加密 mc stat myminio/test01/synk.jpg --insecure Name : synk.jpg Date : 2021-03-15 11:54:36 CST Size : 112 B ETag : 2ced7fb62d324c643aeb21eccbe86eeb Type : file Metadata : Content-Type: application/x-sh Encrypted : X-Amz-Server-Side-Encryption: AES256
# 将上传的文件下载到本地 mc cp myminio/test01/synk.jpg 001.jpg --insecure </code></pre><h4 id="清理"><a class="anchor" href="#清理">#</a> 清理</h4><figure class="highlight shell"><figcaption data-lang="Bash"><span>l</span></figcaption><table><tr><td data-num="1"></td><td><pre>./clean.sh</pre></td></tr></table></figure><!-- rebuild by hrmmi -->
